alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:28PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm wind will impact portions of Jefferson and Saline Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Friend to 2 miles northeast of Cuba. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Friend around 835 PM CDT. Dorchester around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Crete and Fairbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
